fr.playsoft.android.tools.simpledb

Class SimpleDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.playsoft.android.tools.simpledb.SimpleDB

  • public abstract class SimpleDB
extends Object
    Simple database implementation. Database was designed to have optimal performance - it is stored in memory and loaded/saved from internal storage only once.
    Author:
    Olgierd Uzieblo

    • Constructor Summary

      SimpleDB(Context pContext, String pAdditionalNameSuffix, boolean pIsGZIPEnabled, int pCurrentDBVersion, ISimpleDBLoadSaveListener pDBLoadSaveListener)

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleDB

        public SimpleDB(Context pContext,
        String pAdditionalNameSuffix,
        boolean pIsGZIPEnabled,
        int pCurrentDBVersion,
        ISimpleDBLoadSaveListener pDBLoadSaveListener)
        Creates this SimpleDB instance and loads the data.
        Parameters:
        pContext - Context to use.
        pAdditionalNameSuffix - Additional part of database name - can be null. Should be used if there are multiple instances of the same database - so that they can be saved in different files.
        pIsGZIPEnabled - Is GZIP compression enabled for this database.
        pCurrentDBVersion - Database version - if database structure changes this int should be changed too.
        pDBLoadSaveListener - Listener to be called when database is loaded/saved. Can be null if you dont care.

    • Method Detail

      • createTables

        protected abstract List<SimpleDBTable> createTables()
        Creates all tables used by this database. Returns list containing empty tables.

      • setOnLoadSaveListener

        public final void setOnLoadSaveListener(ISimpleDBLoadSaveListener pDBLoadSaveListener)
        Sets new listener to be called when database finished loading/saving.
        Parameters:
        pDBLoadSaveListener - New listener, can be null if you dont care.

      • insertOrUpdate

        public final void insertOrUpdate(int pTableId,
                  SimpleDBRow pDataToInsert)
        Inserts/updates a single row.
        Parameters:
        pTableId - Table id.
        pDataToInsert - Row to insert/update.

      • getTable

        public final SimpleDBTable getTable(int pTableId)
        Gets single table.
        Parameters:
        pTableId - Table id.
        Returns:
        Desired table.

      • clearAndDeleteDatabase

        public final void clearAndDeleteDatabase()
        Clears whole database - clears all tables. Also deletes physical file from internal memory and updates preferences.

      • isSavingNeeded

        public final boolean isSavingNeeded()
        Checks if this database needs to be saved.
        Returns:
        True if something has changed and this database should be saved.

      • getCurrendDBName

        public final String getCurrendDBName()
        Gets file name of currently used database.
        Returns:
        DB file name.

      • isIndexedRowExists

        public final boolean isIndexedRowExists(int pTableId,
                         int pKeyValue)
        Checks if chosen row exists for chosen table. Works only for indexed tables.
        Parameters:
        pTableId - Table id.
        pKeyValue - Unique key value.
        Returns:
        True if such row exists.

      • getAllRowsForMainKey

        public final List<SimpleDBRow> getAllRowsForMainKey(int pTableId,
                                     int pKeyValue)
        Gets all rows for which main key equals chosen main key. For tables with unique main key this will return only one row. Returns null if list is empty.
        Parameters:
        pTableId - Table id.
        pKeyValue - Main key value.
        Returns:
        List of rows or null if it is empty.

      • getAllTableRows

        public final List<SimpleDBRow> getAllTableRows(int pTableId)
        Gets all rows from chosen table.
        Parameters:
        pTableId - Table id.
        Returns:
        List with all rows in this table or null if there is no data!

      • deleteAllRowsForMainKey

        public final void deleteAllRowsForMainKey(int pTableId,
                           int pKeyValue)
        Deletes all rows for which main key equals chosen main key.
        Parameters:
        pTableId - Table id.
        pKeyValue - Main key value.

      • delete

        public final void delete(int pTableId,
          int pKeyValue)
        Deletes row from chosen table using its unique key.
        Parameters:
        pTableId - Table id.
        pKeyValue - Value of unique key.

      • isSavingInProgress

        public final boolean isSavingInProgress()
        Checks if database saving is in progress.
        Returns:
        True if saving is in progress.

      • isLoadingInProgress

        public final boolean isLoadingInProgress()
        Checks if database loading is in progress.
        Returns:
        True if loading is in progress.

      • save

        public final void save()
        Saves the database. Database is saved in a different file than original db. Original db is deleted only if save was successful.
